alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 6:24AM PST until December 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the High Wind Warning, areas of north to northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Western San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley
